incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MTN Network in Cameroon

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN Network in Cameroon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN Network in Cameroon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in New Zealand

incident_updates.body:
We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to the below listed networks in New Zealand. 

- 2Degrees
- One NZ
- Vodafone

 Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to the below listed networks in New Zealand. 

- 2Degrees
- One NZ
- Vodafone

 Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

It has been determined that the following Network Operators are experiencing SMS delivery delays in New Zealand.

- 2Degrees
- One NZ
- Vodafone

Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to 2degrees Network in New Zealand. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS delivery failures and delays to Multiple countries for Authy Customers

incident_updates.body: The issue causing intermittent Authy outbound SMS delivery failures when sender IDs are not preserved has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing intermittent Authy outbound SMS delivery failures when sender IDs are not preserved has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate the issue causing intermittent Authy Outbound SMS delivery Failures where Sender IDs not preserved has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate the issue causing intermittent Authy Outbound SMS delivery Failures where Sender IDs not preserved has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue is causing intermittent Authy Outbound SMS delivery Failures where Sender IDs not preserved has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue is causing intermittent Authy Outbound SMS delivery Failures where Sender IDs not preserved has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Authy and potential Outbound SMS delivery Failures, Sender IDs not preserved. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks in Bangladesh

incident_updates.body: We continue monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently monitoring successful SMS deliveries to the Robi network in Bangladesh. However, we continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing successful SMS delivery to Robi Network in Bangladesh and we are currently monitoring it. We are also experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing successful SMS delivery to Robi Network in Bangladesh and we are currently monitoring it. We are also experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages over Grameen Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing SMS Delivery failurs sending to   Robi Network in Bangladesh and are working with our partner carrier to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have detected that Multiple Networks are experiencing SMS delivery failures in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery failures sending to Robi Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Australia SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Australia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 22 July 2024 at 08:00 PDT until 22 July 2024 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from Australia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner EE UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 July 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 22 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Win Mobile/Volna Mobile

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 July 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 22 July 2024 at 20:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 23 July 2024 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: We’re conducting a planned Global maintenance between 15:00 to 15:30 Pacific Time on 08/03/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 3, 2024. Due to Authy API’s deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Voice Maintenance (Frankfurt, Germany)

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 Aug 13:00 until 16 Aug 20:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Frankfurt, Germany (DE1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Europe.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Interconnect Maintenance (Frankfurt, Germany)

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 16 Aug 13:00 until 16 Aug 20:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Frankfurt, Germany (DE1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in DE1.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Voice Maintenance (Frankfurt, Germany)

10 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 11 July 2024 at 00:00 PDT
